name: Spray Tan Packages
description:
Is your partner struggling to come up with a gift idea?  If you love your spray tans then consider one of our spray tan packages.  Choose from either in-salon or mobile options and you will be looking your tanned glamourous best in no time.

Each package includes six Black Magic or Naked Tan spray tans.  We are located in Blue Haven on the New South Wales Central Coast and travel to areas within the Wyong Shire and lower Lake Macquarie.  Please contact us prior to purchase if you are unsure if we service your suburb.

Remember:  preparation and maintenance are the key to an amazing looking and long lasting tan!

name: Naked Tan
description:
Prep Pack

Contains 1 x Creme de la Creme 150ml, 1 x Walnut Body Polish 150ml

Prepare your skin for your tan by gently exfoliating and polishing with the Walnut Body Polish. Containing organic shea butter enriched with jojoba, gold mica shimmer and crushed walnut.

Exuding a delicious coconut and vanilla scent, Creme de la Creme hydrates and nourishes giving your skin a silky smooth finish before you tan.

Other products available:

Creme de la Creme - $24.95

Exuding a delicious coconut and vanilla scent, Creme de la Creme hydrates and nourishes giving your skin a silky smooth finish in preparation before and after you tan.

Walnut Body Polish - $21.00

Prepare your skin for your tan by gently exfoliating and polishing with the Walnut Body Polish. Containing organic shea butter enriched with jojoba, gold mica shimmer and crushed walnut.

Organic Body Cleanser - $21.00

Organic body cleanser from Naked Tan will wash away the grime of the day but not your tan. Infused with a delicious vanilla and coconut scent, your tan will glow and your skin will feel fresh.

Goddess Glaze - $26.95

Extend the longevity of your tan. Naked Tan Goddess Glaze enhances and offers a natural glow. Can be applied daily from the third day after your spray tan. Enriched with Organic Shea butter, Aloe Vera and containing 3% DHA.

Goddess Shimmer - $26.95

Illuminate your skin with the natural shimmer of mica from Naked Tan. Highlight and enhance your inner sparkle and shine, transforming you into a goddess who will shimmer every time.

name: Black Magic
description:
To get a great result from your spray tan you need to prepare your skin. Nothing is better than exfoliating and moisturising!

Black Magic Pack

Contains 1 x Xfoliate Mitt and 1 x Tan Xtend

Uncover your new skin with an Xfoliate Mitt. The Xfoliate Mitt will help remove old spray tan and dead skin cells in readiness for your next tan. Made from all natural fibres and environmentally friendly dyes.

Tan Xtend from Black Magic is a natural emollient based moisturiser that softens and smooths the skin. It contains Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) which extends the life of your tan when used daily. Black Magic’s Tan Xtend can be used on its own for a light and natural gradual tan. It is Paraben free, Sulphate free, Propylene glycol free, DEA free and artificial colour free.

Other products available:

Black Magic Tan Pack - $50.00

Contains 1 x Xfoliate Mitt and 1 x Tan Extend plus 1 x in-salon Black Magic spray tan.

You've got all you need to prepare and maintain your tan, but what about the colour ? Purchase this pack and it includes an in-salon spray tan gift certificate. That's a 23% saving!!

Xfoliate - $19.95

Xfoliate will reveal soft new skin ready for your next spray tan. Use Xfoliate prior to receiving your spray tan, rubbing the gel onto dry skin in circular motions to bring out a beading of dead skin.

Xfoliate Mitt - $19.95

Uncover your new skin with an Xfoliate Mitt. The Xfoliate Mitt will help remove old spray tan and dead skin cells in readiness for your next tan. Made from all natural fibres and environmentally friendly dyes.

Tan Xtend - $19.95

Tan Xtend from Black Magic is a natural emollient based moisturiser that softens and smooths the skin. It contains Dihydroxyacetone (DHA) which extends the life of your tan when used daily. Black Magic’s Tan Xtend can be used on its own for a light and natural gradual tan. It is Paraben free, Sulphate free, Propylene glycol free, DEA free and artificial colour free.

White Magic Pen - $19.95

We all want white beautiful teeth and with the White Magic Pen that beautiful smile can be yours again. The White Magic Pen is a safe and convenient way to keep your teeth white and looking great. Containing enough clear gel product for up to 40 applications with an easy brush on application, you will see results in only a few days.
